name: Operation Solis
description:
Epic MegaJam 2022 - Operation Solis

Theme : As Above, So Below
- Operation Solis uses the Literary interpretation of that saying, what happens in the heavens affects Earth below it, and vice versa. However, it is less spiritual and more themed around light and dark.

-Humanity has been driven underground by the darkness, a mistake brought on by the harvesting of a celestial being in order to power the planet with clean energy. With the imprisonment of this being came the death of the stars.

-Your goal is to fight your way through the mass power facility, through the remnants of humans cursed by darkness while building up resources in order to restore the being back to full strength so that it may return to the stars and eliminate the darkness.
